doc:
Gregory Sierra https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gregory_Sierra 0 Gregory Sierra (born January 25, 1937) is an American actor known for his roles as Detective Sergeant Chano Amenguale on Barney Miller and as Julio Fuentes, the Puerto Rican neighbor of Fred G. Sanford on Sanford and Son (portrayed by Redd Foxx). Gregory_Sierra ( born January_25_,_1937 ) is an_American_actor known for his_roles as Detective_Sergeant_Chano_Amenguale on Barney_Miller and as Julio_Fuentes , the_Puerto_Rican_neighbor of Fred_G._Sanford on Sanford_and_Son ( portrayed by Redd_Foxx ) .
